M

MainMenuScreen - Class in com.mygdx.game.view
MainMenuScreen is a class that deals with the view of the main menu screen, dealing with the input in it, the images displayed in it and the launching of the game if the PLAY option is chose, or the exit of the game if that option is chose.
MainMenuScreen(Downwell) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.view.MainMenuScreen
Constructor of the class, loads the sound, creates a camera and viewport.
makeView(Downwell, ElementModel) - Static method in class com.mygdx.game.view.ViewFactory
Returns the view correspondent to the model given.
mapTileBeginContact(Contact) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.controller.GameController
Checks if the collision is between the hero and a map tile and calls the appropriated method.
MapTileBody - Class in com.mygdx.game.controller
MapTileBody is a class that contains the information about with the physics body of the MapTile.
MapTileModel - Class in com.mygdx.game.model
MapTileModel is a class that contains and deals with all the information about a MapTile,including its type of tile and its flag for removal.
MapTileModel(float, float, MapTileModel.TileType) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.model.MapTileModel
Constructor of class.
MapTileModel.TileType - Enum in com.mygdx.game.model
 
MapTileView - Class in com.mygdx.game.view
MapTileView is a class that deals with the view of a tile, identifying its type and choosing a texture according to it.
MapTileView(Downwell, MapTileModel.TileType) - Constructor for class com.mygdx.game.view.MapTileView
Constructor of the class, it creates a sprite and sets its animation to null, because it won't have animation.
MAX_SHOTS - Static variable in class com.mygdx.game.controller.GameController
 
ModelTests - Class in <Unnamed>
 
ModelTests() - Constructor for class ModelTests
 
moveHeroLeft() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.controller.GameController
Sets the state of the hero to moving left and having the animation flip.
moveHeroRight() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.controller.GameController
Sets the state of the hero to moving right and having the animation flip.
